Locale.Value:
Fixes and Improvements in 2.16.8
- Classic iPods: on some non-iOS iPod models, all tracks were greyed out and therefore not transferrable; This issue has been fixed
- Messages and WhatsApp: errors while exporting attachments can now be ignored
- Notes: pencil written notes are now exported in their highest quality; The background of the exported image will also be always white instead of transparent
- Contacts: custom contact details are now displayed properly (Windows)
- Music: in the media browser, fixed incorrect width for Title, Artist and Album columns: please note your media browser view settings will be reset (macOS)
- iMazing CLI: now supports sending commands to devices in Recovery or DFU mode to update or reinstall iOS. See new command --device-list-recovery-or-dfu
- Fixed some rare crashes
